languages.text: "Обвинения выдвинуты от имени Драйвстемов, губернаторского рода. В обычных обстоятельствах разбирательство прошло бы и без вашего вмешательства и вся моя семья была бы... но Версериан — благородный род, и по старинной традиции имеет право раз в поколение обратиться за личной защитой Вольного Торговца. Вашей, Лорд-капитан". {n}Абеляр поднимает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Заклинаю вас — не откажите нам в сей чести".

"The accusations were levelled by, or on behalf of, the Drivestems. The governing house. Under normal circumstances, the investigation would not have required your involvement, and my entire family would have been... But being of noble stock, the Werserians are entitled under an ancient custom to petition for a Rogue Trader's personal protection once in a generation. Your personal protection, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard raises his gaze to you.{/n} "Do not deny us that honour, I implore you."
languages.original_text: "Обвинения выдвинуты от имени Драйвстемов, губернаторского рода. В обычных обстоятельствах разбирательство прошло бы и без вашего вмешательства и вся моя семья была бы... но Версериан — благородный род, и по старинной традиции имеет право раз в поколение обратиться за личной защитой Вольного Торговца. Вашей, Лорд-капитан". {n}Абеляр поднимает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Заклинаю вас — не откажите нам в сей чести".

But the Werserians, being of noble stock, are entitled under an ancient custom to petition for a Rogue Trader's personal protection once in a generation. Your personal protection, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard raises his eyes at you.{/n} "Do not deny us that honour, I implore you."

Your personal protection, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard raises his gaze to you.{/n} "Do not deny us that honour, I implore you."

languages.text: “这些指控是德莱夫斯塔总督的家族提出来的，或者是在他们的名义下提出的。通常情况下，诸如此类的调查并不需要您亲自参与，我的家族所有成员都会被……不过，韦尔森家族是达戈努斯的贵族家族。根据古老的习俗，韦尔森家族每代人都有权请求行商浪人保护一次，寻求您的个人保护，舰长大人。”{n}阿贝拉德抬起头，看着你。{/n}“请您不要拒绝我们的荣耀，我恳求您。”
languages.original_text: "The accusations were levelled by, or on behalf of, the Drivestems. The governing house. Under normal circumstances, the investigation would not have required your involvement, and my entire family would have been... But being of noble stock, the Werserians are entitled under an ancient custom to petition for a Rogue Trader's personal protection once in a generation. Your personal protection, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard raises his gaze to you.{/n} "Do not deny us that honour, I implore you."

traits.locale_text: “这些指控是德莱夫斯塔家族提出来的，或者是在他们的名义下提出的。通常情况下，诸如此类的调查并不需要您亲自参与，我的家族所有成员都会被……不过，韦尔森家族是达戈努斯的贵族家族。根据古老的习俗，韦尔森家族每代人都有权请求行商浪人保护一次，寻求您的个人保护，舰长大人。”{n}阿贝拉德抬起头，看着你。{/n}“请您不要拒绝我们的荣耀，我恳求您。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Die Anschuldigungen wurden von den Drivestems ausgesprochen, oder in deren Namen. Dem regierenden Haus. Unter normalen Umständen wäre Eure Beteiligung an der Untersuchung nicht erforderlich gewesen, und meine gesamte Familie wäre ... Aber da die Werserians von adligem Blut sind, steht ihnen nach einem uralten Brauch das Recht zu, einmal pro Generation den persönlichen Schutz eines Freihändlers zu erbitten. Euren persönlichen Schutz, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard blickt dich mit einer erhobenen Augenbraue an.{/n} "Verwehrt uns diese Ehre nicht, ich flehe Euch an."
languages.original_text: "The accusations were levelled by, or on behalf of, the Drivestems. The governing house. Under normal circumstances, the investigation would not have required your involvement, and my entire family would have been... But being of noble stock, the Werserians are entitled under an ancient custom to petition for a Rogue Trader's personal protection once in a generation. Your personal protection, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard raises his gaze to you.{/n} "Do not deny us that honour, I implore you."

traits.locale_text: "Die Anschuldigungen wurden von den Drivestems ausgesprochen, oder in deren Namen. Der Familie des Gouverneurs. Unter normalen Umständen wäre Eure Beteiligung an der Untersuchung nicht erforderlich gewesen, und meine gesamte Familie wäre ... Aber da die Werserians von adligem Blut sind, steht ihnen nach einem uralten Brauch das Recht zu, einmal pro Generation den persönlichen Schutz eines Freihändlers zu erbitten. Euren persönlichen Schutz, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard blickt dich mit einer erhobenen Augenbraue an.{/n} "Verwehrt uns diese Ehre nicht, ich flehe Euch an."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Las acusaciones han sido formuladas por, o en nombre de, los Drivestem. La familia gobernante. En circunstancias normales la investigación no habría requerido de su participación, y mi familia entera habría sido... Pero al ser de noble alcurnia, los Werserian pueden acogerse a una antigua tradición que les permite solicitar la protección personal de un Comerciante Independiente una vez en cada generación. Su protección personal, Lord Capitán». {n}Abelard levanta la mirada hacia ti.{/n} «No nos niegue ese honor, se lo ruego».
languages.original_text: "The accusations were levelled by, or on behalf of, the Drivestems. The governing house. Under normal circumstances, the investigation would not have required your involvement, and my entire family would have been... But being of noble stock, the Werserians are entitled under an ancient custom to petition for a Rogue Trader's personal protection once in a generation. Your personal protection, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard raises his gaze to you.{/n} "Do not deny us that honour, I implore you."

traits.locale_text: «Las acusaciones han sido formuladas por, o en nombre de, los Drivestem. La familia del gobernador. En circunstancias normales la investigación no habría requerido de su participación, y mi familia entera habría sido... Pero al ser de noble alcurnia, los Werserian pueden acogerse a una antigua tradición que les permite solicitar la protección personal de un Comerciante Independiente una vez en cada generación. Su protección personal, Lord Capitán». {n}Abelard levanta la mirada hacia ti.{/n} «No nos niegue ese honor, se lo ruego».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Ces accusations ont été portées par les Drivestem, ou bien en leur nom. Il s'agit de la famille au pouvoir. En temps normal, vous n'auriez pas eu à vous mêler de cette enquête et ma famille tout entière aurait été... Cependant, la noble lignée des Werserian leur permet de jouir d'une vieille tradition : ils peuvent, une fois par génération, demander la protection personnelle d'un libre-marchand. En l'occurrence, la vôtre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, {n}déclare-t-il en levant les yeux vers vous.{/n} Je vous en conjure, ne nous refusez pas cet honneur. »
languages.original_text: "The accusations were levelled by, or on behalf of, the Drivestems. The governing house. Under normal circumstances, the investigation would not have required your involvement, and my entire family would have been... But being of noble stock, the Werserians are entitled under an ancient custom to petition for a Rogue Trader's personal protection once in a generation. Your personal protection, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard raises his gaze to you.{/n} "Do not deny us that honour, I implore you."

traits.locale_text: « Ces accusations ont été portées par les Drivestem, ou bien en leur nom. Il s'agit de la famille du gouverneur. En temps normal, vous n'auriez pas eu à vous mêler de cette enquête et ma famille tout entière aurait été... Cependant, la noble lignée des Werserian leur permet de jouir d'une vieille tradition : ils peuvent, une fois par génération, demander la protection personnelle d'un libre-marchand. En l'occurrence, la vôtre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, {n}déclare-t-il en vous regardant droit dans les yeux.{/n} Je vous en conjure, ne nous refusez pas cet honneur. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「告発はドライブステン家により、あるいはその代理により行われました。総督の一家です。通常であれば捜査にあなたが関与する必要はなく、おそらく私の一族が…しかし、貴族の血筋であるウェルザリアン家は、古くからの慣習により、一世代に一度、ローグトレーダーの個人的な保護を請願できる権利があります。あなたの個人的な保護です、ロード・キャプテン」{n}アベラルドはあなたに向かって視線を上げた。{/n}「我々のその名誉を否定しないでください、お願いします」
languages.original_text: "The accusations were levelled by, or on behalf of, the Drivestems. The governing house. Under normal circumstances, the investigation would not have required your involvement, and my entire family would have been... But being of noble stock, the Werserians are entitled under an ancient custom to petition for a Rogue Trader's personal protection once in a generation. Your personal protection, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard raises his gaze to you.{/n} "Do not deny us that honour, I implore you."

traits.locale_text: 「告発はドライブステン家により、あるいはその代理により行われました。総督の一家です。通常であれば捜査にあなたが関与する必要はなく、おそらく私の一族が…しかし、貴族の血筋であるウェルザリアン家は、古くからの慣習により、一世代に一度、ローグトレーダーの個人的な保護を請願できる権利があります。あなたの個人的な保護です、ロード・キャプテン」{n}アベラルドはあなたに向かって視線を上げた。{/n}「我々のその名誉を否定しないでください、お願いします」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Suçlamalar, gezegeni idare eden hane olan Drivestem ailesi tarafından veya onlar adına yapılmış. Normalde araştırmaya sizin dâhil olmanız gerekmezdi ve bütün ailem... Fakat soylu kökenli olduklarından Werserianlar, kadim bir geleneğe göre nesilde bir olmak üzere Hür Tacir'in kişisel korumasını talep etme hakkına sahip. Sizin kişisel korumanızı Lord Kaptan." {n}Abelard, bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Bu onuru elimizden almayın. Size yalvarıyorum."
languages.original_text: "The accusations were levelled by, or on behalf of, the Drivestems. The governing house. Under normal circumstances, the investigation would not have required your involvement, and my entire family would have been... But being of noble stock, the Werserians are entitled under an ancient custom to petition for a Rogue Trader's personal protection once in a generation. Your personal protection, Lord Captain." {n}Abelard raises his gaze to you.{/n} "Do not deny us that honour, I implore you."

traits.locale_text: "Suçlamalar, yöneten hane olan Drivestem ailesi tarafından veya onlar adına yapılmış. Normalde araştırmaya sizin dâhil olmanız gerekmezdi ve bütün ailem... Fakat soylulardan geldikleri için Werserian ailesi, kadim bir geleneğe göre nesilde bir Hür Tacir'in kişisel koruması olma talebinde bulunabilme hakkına sahip. Sizin kişisel korumanız Lord Kaptan." {n}Abelard bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Bu onuru elimizden almayın. Size yalvarıyorum."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
